article_title: Sorrow to head BB&T Huffaker in Chattanooga
article_text:
Sorrow, who previously headed Cigna health insurance operations in Chattanooga and mostly recently was corporate vice presient for Magellan Health Services, succeeds Roger Smith and Bill Wilder as head of BB&T’s insurance operations in Chattanooga. Raised in Chattanooga, Sorrow earned a bachelor of business administration degree in risk management…
